message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to consider your product. However, $950000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for. I'm willing to pay $800000.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for 850000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
